column1: Why do you want to work with us?
What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Why are you leaving your current job (or why did you leave your last job)?
Can you describe a challenging situation at work and how you handled it?
Tell me about a time you made a mistake and how you fixed it.
How do you handle stress and pressure?
Tell me about a time you had a conflict with a team member. How did you resolve it?
Describe a situation where you took initiative or showed leadership.
How do you prioritize your work when handling multiple tasks or deadlines?
Why do you think you're a good fit for this role?
Do you have any questions for us?
